title: When "loading screen shows up" the window crashes
body:
Anyone else have issues with not being able to load into the actual game. I left a ticket about this to technical support yesterday but no such luck for a reply yet and I have boost running and such so I'm unable to play. I have went through things looked through my firewall and one thing i never noticed was "Riot" "league of legends" anything with those types of words that were not checkmarked. This just started happening (that i noticed) yesterday however the day before everything was fine. I have looked at past issues but yet to figureout a fix for this. Any ideas?

Edit: Checked firewall just to make sure and I do see "Lol Launcher" and it is marked as being able to by pass the firewall.

replies.body:
Our techs might be running a little behind lately if they haven't responded yet, but that was a good first step double checking your firewalls! Do me a favor and go ahead and update your port forward settings as well as your DNS server options using this [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to try and get a smoother signal with our game servers.

You also mentioned the loading screen "crashing" so I'm curious if some of your game files might be corrupted or missing. Go ahead and run a repair as well just in case something is messed up in your installation!
